sn26.5:1.2: “Yo kho, bhikkhave, cakkhusamphassajaya vedanaya uppado thiti …pe… jaramaranassa patubhavo …pe….
sn26.5:2.3: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, cakkhusamphassajaya vedanaya nirodho vupasamo …pe…
sn26.5:2.5: yo manosamphassajaya vedanaya nirodho vupasamo atthangamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, roganam vupasamo, jaramaranassa atthangamo”ti.
